channel.title: Asshole_rule for Server Helper badge
channel.description: I believe that asshole_rule is an amazing, helpful, considerate member. He is always helping out any members in need in the RS2 section to his full extent. He never gives up. asshole_rule always gives out the right answer to any members in help. He also works very well with every other member; he barely trolls (doesn't anymore) and loves other people helping.
